1. "The Notebook" (2004) - A timeless love story set in the early 1940s that follows a poor and uneducated soldier who falls in love with a rich young woman.

2. "Titanic" (1997) - A classic romantic disaster film about a young woman aboard the RMS Titanic who meets a man from third class and the tragedy that unfolds.

3. "Crazy, Stupid, Love" (2011) - A comedy-drama revolving around a middle-aged man learning to navigate love in the modern world with the help of a charming womanizer.

4. "La La Land" (2016) - A musical about a jazz pianist who falls in love with an aspiring actress in Los Angeles, and their struggle to balance their relationships with their dreams.

5. "Pride and Prejudice" (2005) - A period drama adapted from Jane Austen's novel of the same name, following the relationship between Mr. Darcy, a haughty but charming aristocrat, and Elizabeth Bennet, a headstrong young woman from a family of five daughters.

6. "The Fault in Our Stars" (2014) - A heartwarming romance about two teenagers with cancer who meet at a support group and fall in love while dealing with their illnesses together.

Enjoy the movies!
